sentences.en: Ah Liu suddenly entered with a woeful look and asked for a tip.
sentences.cn: 阿刘忽然进来,哭丧着脸向他讨小费.

sentences.en: Failure to keep pace in the fast - changing computer world can exact a woeful price.
sentences.cn: 在计算机世界里跟不上急速变化的步伐就要付出可悲的代价.

sentences.en: Forlorn and woeful the old capital lay in gray morning light as we entered.
sentences.cn: 当我们进入南京的时候,这古老的京城正孤独地,忧郁地躺在灰色的晨曦中.

sentences.en: His woeful eyes betrayed his feeling.
sentences.cn: 他忧伤的眼神泄露了他的心情.

sentences.en: His work displays a woeful lack of imagination.
sentences.cn: 他的作品令人遗憾地显示出缺乏想像力.

sentences.en: Phil Picken completed 90 minutes as Chesterfield's woeful form continued with a 3 - 1 defeat at Port Vale.
sentences.cn: 菲尔-皮肯打满90分钟,但是切斯特菲尔德悲惨的被伯特瓦尔 3-1 击败遭遇连败.

sentences.en: She displayed a woeful ignorance of the rules.
sentences.cn: 她对这些条例表现出可悲的无知。

sentences.en: Stroeve gave me a look with his woeful eyes.
sentences.cn: 施特略夫用他那对愁苦的眼睛瞪了我一眼.

sentences.en: Such attitudes are the product of woeful ignorance.
sentences.cn: 这样的态度是极度无知造成的。

sentences.en: The woeful news grieved the nation.
sentences.cn: 这悲惨的消息使举国悲痛.

sentences.en: We can't have a light heart if our minds woeful cauldron of fear and ambition.
sentences.cn: 如果我们的头脑充满恐惧与野心,我们就无法拥有快乐的心.
今日不节约,明日即缺之.

sentences.en: Woeful souls are wailing in an abysmal pond.
sentences.cn: 悲伤的灵魂在无底的深潭里哭泣.

words.tran_cn: 悲伤地；不幸地；使人痛苦地
唉（表示痛苦，悲伤或悔恨）
悲哀的；悲惨的；遗憾的；不幸的
